infoHouse: Ravenclaw was founded by Rowena Ravenclaw, who valued intelligence, learning, and wit in her students.
infoHouseBottom: Ravenclaw house is known for producing brilliant and creative witches and wizards, including Luna Lovegood and Cho Chang.

characterOne.name: Luna Lovegood
characterOne.info: An eccentric and intelligent witch, known for her creativity, wisdom, and unique perspective.

characterTwo.name: Cho Chang
characterTwo.info: A talented and intelligent student, admired for her grace, skill in Quidditch, and clever mind.

characterThree.name: Professor Filius Flitwick
characterThree.info: The Head of Ravenclaw House and Charms professor, known for his brilliance, wisdom, and dedication to his students.
